knimeNode.name: Groovy Script
knimeNode.shortDescription: Executes a groovy script to create a new table from an (optionally empty) set of input tables.

fullDescription.intro:
Executes a groovy script to create a new table from an (optionally empty) set of input tables. Addtional classpath entries can be added in the Knime-preferences.
Detailed documentation about the scripting integration:
MPI-CBG SWEG Wiki
